EmailTemplate.name: Tour Reminder2
EmailTemplate.subject: We look forward to seeing you soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
www.wework.com
http://facebook.com/wework
http://twitter.com/wework
http://instagram.com/wework
http://www.pinterest.com/wework
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c},
Just wanted to remind you about your tour scheduled for {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}. We can’t wait to meet you and learn more about what you do.
When you arrive at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c}, please {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Special_Instructions__c}
If you have any questions, call us at 855-5-WeWork.
See you soon!
VALERIE BATISTA Director of Sales joinus@wework.com 855.593.9675
Can’t make it? You can reschedule for a more convenient time.
https://welcome.wework.com/forms/modifytour.php?tourId={!Tour_Outcome__c.Id}
